page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT IN ARBROATH.
page.content: Unemployment is high in Arbroath.The main area of{industry}lies on the edge of town just off the main Dundee road.Most of the factories are fairly new and some{housing}has grown up around them.Halliburtons,a multi national company,is the major employer.They make oil pumps and their headquarters are in the U.S.A.Francis Webster's is involved in the weaving{ {trade}and have just opened their new factory on the estate.Other factories on the estate include Metal Box, Scottish Road Services,who deal with transport,The Knitwear factory,and Henderson's who design kitchen tools and accessories.The range of factories means that even if one of the factories has to closedown and pay men off there will be many jobs left because they are all different types of manufacturers.
